subject: Product exchange request | Order #SNS5343
description_text:
Dear Sir or Madam,

I am writing to request an exchange regarding my order number SNS5343,
confirmed on December 26.

The order currently includes the Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal
with the Haptic Reactor optional set. After further consideration, I would
like to request an exchange for the Pro X Ultra P2 H2 version instead.

Please note that the order has not yet been shipped and the product remains
new, unused, and in its original packaging.

I kindly ask you to inform me about the availability of the requested
version and to send me the additional amount to be paid so that I can
settle the price difference as soon as possible.

Thank you in advance for your assistance. I look forward to your reply.

Kind regards,

Marco Ervões
marco.ervoes@gmail.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Marco Ervões,    I apologize for not responding to you in a timely manner. Your order has already been shipped, and we are unable to make any changes for you. My apologies! Happy New Year!
